Sylvester Stallone stars in, writes, and directs this charming final installment in the "Rocky" saga, costarring Milo Ventimiglia, Geraldine Hughes, Burt Young and Antonio Tarver(n)

programme.title: X-Rated: The Greatest Adult Movies of All Time
programme.desc: Combining scintillating film clips of the 32 greatest adult movies ever produced with in-depth interviews from the biggest stars in the industry, this erotic documentary is the definitive look at the art of carnal films. Hosted by Chanel Preston, with Jenna Jameson, Ron Jeremy, Marilyn Chambers, Christy Canyon, Jessica Drake, Georgina Spelvin and many more(n)

programme.title: Maz Jobrani: I'm Not a Terrorist But I've Played One on TV
programme.desc: Comedian Maz Jobrani follows up his bestselling book with a hilarious comedy special of the same title, where he takes on political issues, social issues and his kids through the lens of his Iranian-American background to show that we have a lot more in common than we think(n)

programme.title: Mystery, Alaska
programme.desc: When a small town amateur hockey team accepts a challenge to play against the New York Rangers, the entire population must put their petty differences aside and pull together as their small town becomes the center of a nationally televised event. Features an all-star cast, including Russel Crowe, Hank Azaria and Burt Reynolds(n)

programme.title: Casino Royale (2006)
programme.desc: The saga of James Bond, agent 007 of Her Majesty's Secret Service, is given a fresh injection of high-octane thrills with this reboot of the spy series starring Daniel Craig as a newly minted, wet-nosed "blunt instrument" assigned his first mission: take down the sinister La Chiffre, an international arms dealer selling dangerous weapons to terrorists. Eva Green and Judi Dench costar in this box office blockbuster that relaunches the Bond franchise(n)

programme.title: The Thaw
programme.desc: Val Kilmer stars as a famed scientist who unearths a prehistoric specimen in the Arctic that soon unleashes a swarm of dangerous parasites, forcing himself and his students to quarantine themselves or risk infecting the world(n)

programme.title: Exists
programme.desc: When a group of friends on a camping trip have an accident on a desolate country road, they unwittingly unleash a bloodcurdling force of nature(n)

programme.title: Death Warrant
programme.desc: In this martial arts action flick, Jean-Claude Van Damme stars as a Canadian Mountie who is assigned to a bizarre case involving the murder of prison inmates. Sent to jail, in the undercover guise of a criminal, he is hot on the trail of the killer until one of his former busts is transferred to the same prison(n)

programme.title: The Warrior's Way
programme.desc: After a lifetime of training in swordsmanship and hand-to-hand combat, the world's most dangerous fighter flees his homeland to start a new life in the American west. But soon the hunter becomes the hunted, and the legendary warrior must wage a fierce, all-out battle against a renegade gang of outlaws and a pack of murderous assassins from his past. Stars Kate Bosworth and Academy Award� winner Geoffrey Rush(n)

programme.title: Zodiac
programme.desc: A newspaper cartoonist becomes obsessed with solving San Francisco's infamous "Zodiac" serial killer case, and eventually closes in on a suspect after the case has long become cold in this fact-based thriller starring Jake Gyllenhaal, Mark Ruffalo, Robert Downey Jr. and Chloe Sevigny(n)

programme.title: Casino Royale (2006)
programme.desc: The saga of James Bond, agent 007 of Her Majesty's Secret Service, is given a fresh injection of high-octane thrills with this reboot of the spy series starring Daniel Craig as a newly minted, wet-nosed "blunt instrument" assigned his first mission: take down the sinister La Chiffre, an international arms dealer selling dangerous weapons to terrorists. Eva Green and Judi Dench costar in this box office blockbuster that relaunches the Bond franchise(n)

programme.title: Walking on Sunshine
programme.desc: Love, sun, lust and 80s hit songs collide in this musical romantic comedy set on the stunning coast of Italy, where a young woman is on the precipice of marrying her gorgeous fianc�, not knowing he had a fling with her sister

programme.title: Hot Rod
programme.desc: Funnyman Andy Samberg stars in his first feature, a zany farce about a development-arrested youth who believes that stunt work is in his blood - despite his many failed, highly hazardous attempts at record-setting on his scooter to the contrary. Sissy Spacek, Ian McShane, Isla Fisher, Jorma Tacone, Bill Hader, Danny McBride and Will Parnell costar in this likable, goofy comedy

programme.title: Snow Day
programme.desc: A snowstorm means a day of cancelled school for the delighted children of Syracuse, New York, in this hit family comedy from Nickelodeon Movies, starring Chevy Chase, Mark Webber, Emmanuelle Chriqui, Zina Grey, Chris Elliott, Pam Grier, Iggy Pop and John Schneider

programme.title: The Man Who Shook the Hand of Vicente Fernandez
programme.desc: Academy Award(R) winner Ernest Borgnine stars in this tale of a retired radio DJ who finds himself in a nursing home run by an evil henchman, giving him the chance to pursue his lifelong dream of heroism by leading the Latino staff in a revolt against the tyrannical owner

programme.title: Lance Armstrong: Stop at Nothing
programme.desc: An intimate documentary about the explosive story of cyclist Lance Armstrong, revealing a portrait of a man who will stop at nothing in the pursuit of money, fame and success. Features candid interviews with his friends and enemies to reveal the truth behind the greatest fraud in sporting history

programme.title: Space Warriors
programme.desc: A young whiz kid's dreams comes true when he gets an invitation to space camp, where he gets a chance to compete with other brainiacs but the contest takes a turn when he must use his smarts to deal with a real-life disaster. Stars Mira Sorvino and Danny Glover

programme.title: Becoming Bulletproof
programme.desc: Documentary following the making of a rip-roaring Western costume drama featuring a diverse group of disabled people from across the US, which tells a moving story of big screen barriers and raises questions about why we so rarely see disabled actors on film

programme.title: The Prisoner Of Zenda, Inc.
programme.desc: A fourteen-year-old heir (Jonathan Jackson) to dad's corporation faces the wrath of his power-mad uncle (William Shatner), who plots his nephew's overthrow. Don S. Davis costars in this humorous saga loosely based on Anthony Hope's novel

programme.title: Adventures of the Penguin King
programme.desc: Tim Allen narrates this triumphant, comic, coming-of-age tale about Rex, a penguin with a love of epic voyages and adventure who arrives home to his Antarctic birthplace to search for the perfect mate among the city's six million inhabitants

programme.title: The Hundred-Foot Journey
programme.desc: When a displaced Indian family opens a restaurant in the south of France, just 100 feet from a Michelin star restaurant, a culinary war ensues between the two establishments. Stars Academy Award� winner Helen Mirren

programme.title: I Am Giant: Victor Cruz
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling Victor Cruz's improbable rise to football stardom, the life shattering injury that derailed his career and his dramatic attempt at a comeback, revealing the man behind the mask, as he faces the biggest challenge of his life

programme.title: The Prisoner Of Zenda, Inc.
programme.desc: A fourteen-year-old heir (Jonathan Jackson) to dad's corporation faces the wrath of his power-mad uncle (William Shatner), who plots his nephew's overthrow. Don S. Davis costars in this humorous saga loosely based on Anthony Hope's novel

programme.title: Houseguest
programme.desc: Under the hot pursuit of loan sharks, with nowhere to run and nowhere to hide, Kevin Franklin (Sinbad) stumbles directly into the break of a lifetime: a friendly family man (Phil Hartman) who thinks that Kevin's an old childhood buddy. Guess who's coming to dinner? Jeffrey Jones, Kim Greist, Stan Shaw, Tony Longo, Mason Adams and Ron Glass costar in this zany domestic comedy

programme.title: In a Perfect World
programme.desc: Documentary that explores the dynamics of what it is to be a man raised by a single mother told through the lens of the director's own relationship with her solo-parented son. Features interviews with men of diverse backgrounds and ages, sharing painfully personal anecdotes in the wake of emotionally turbulent and unsettling periods of their youth. This story is both a deeply personal and introspective portrait of a modern family, as well as a probing cinematic essay examining one of society's major ailments

programme.title: Bella
programme.desc: An international soccer star is on his way to sign a multimillion-dollar contract when a series of events unfold that bring his career to an abrupt end, and when his life intersects with a waitress struggling to make it in New York, both of their lives change irrevocably, turning one ordinary day into an unforgettable experience

programme.title: The Hundred-Foot Journey
programme.desc: When a displaced Indian family opens a restaurant in the south of France, just 100 feet from a Michelin star restaurant, a culinary war ensues between the two establishments. Stars Academy Award� winner Helen Mirren(n)

programme.title: The War
programme.desc: Kevin Costner stars as a Vietnam vet who has high hopes of rebuilding his life in this heartwarming tale of a close-knit family, set in Mississippi during the summer of 1970. Elijah Wood also stars as his son(n)

programme.title: The Giver
programme.desc: Haunting futuristic tale about a young man living in a colorless, bland utopia, who meets the Giver, an older man who keeps the memories of the past, and opens his eyes to see the dangerous truth about the world he is living in. Stars Meryl Streep, Jeff Bridges and Katie Holmes(n)

programme.title: Black Filmmaker Showcase: Among Thieves
programme.desc: Hiding out from the police, a thief meets a bedridden senior citizen who begs him to end her life in this short from filmmaker Oscar Daniels(n)

programme.title: Captain Ron
programme.desc: It's high comedy on the high seas as kooky captain-for-hire Kurt Russell helps a family of big city landlubbers break in their new boat-his way! Yes, from stormy seas to modern-day pirates, Mom (Mary Kay Place), Dad (Martin Short) and the kids are in for the Caribbean adventure of a lifetime - whether they want one or not! Benjamin Salisbury, Meadow Sisto, Emannuel Logrono, Jorge Luis Ramos and J.A. Preston co-star(n)

programme.title: Houseguest

programme.title: The One I Wrote For You
programme.desc: A singer/songwriter (Cheyenne Jackson) who walked away from a chance at stardom a decade ago enters a reality TV show contest and finds himself once again drawn into the intoxicating world of fame and fortune. As a semi-finalist, he transforms into an audience favorite - but in his rise to the top, will he forget what matters most?(n)

programme.title: Latino Filmmaker Showcase: Candy and Brandy
programme.desc: A couple's relationship endures a dramatic confrontation that leads to a painful breakup - a situation most notable for the fact that they are portrayed by children in this award-winning tone poem from Spanish filmmaker Ander Duque(n)

programme.title: Latino Filmmaker Showcase: Wilbur
programme.desc: A lonely, stuttering London baker who is still something of a mama's boy despite being his thirties pines for love in this quirky comedy from AFI student Dago Rodriguez(n)

programme.title: Return to Nim's Island
programme.desc: In this sequel, Nim, the precocious daughter of a scientist, still has her gift of being one with nature but now that developers and poachers threaten her island, she and her father must fight to preserve their pristine home and its abundant wildlife. Stars Bindi Irwin and John Waters(n)

programme.title: Paper Planes
programme.desc: An imaginative young Australian boy discovers that his talent for folding and flying paper planes could take him to the World Paper Plane Championships to compete against powerful rivals. Stars Sam Worthington(n)

programme.title: The Accidental Spy
programme.desc: Jackie Chan stars in this globe-trotting adventure as a sporting goods salesman whose dream of being an international spy comes true when he foils a bank robbery and is recruited to search for a missing person in Korea, where he uncovers a plot involving a hidden fortune and a stolen weapon of mass destruction. Eric Tsang and Vivian Hsu costar(n)

programme.title: One Direction - Where We Are: Live from San Siro Stadium
programme.desc: Filmed over two nights at the iconic San Siro Stadium in Milan, this concert film features the chart topping pop sensation boy band One Direction performing all their biggest hits(n)

programme.title: Latino Filmmaker Showcase: Candy and Brandy
programme.desc: A couple's relationship endures a dramatic confrontation that leads to a painful breakup - a situation most notable for the fact that they are portrayed by children in this award-winning tone poem from Spanish filmmaker Ander Duque(n)

Eric Tsang and Vivian Hsu costar(n)

programme.title: The Virgin Suicides
programme.desc: Kirsten Dunst stars in this ethereal drama based on the best-selling novel about a family of repressed teenaged girls in the 1970s who take drastic action to escape their restrictive home life. Danny DeVito, Josh Hartnett, Kathleen Turner and James Woods costar in the directorial debut of Sofia Coppola

programme.title: The Disappearance of Alice Creed
programme.desc: When a pair of ex-cons kidnaps a wealthy young woman, they don't anticipate that their victim will be smarter than they are and begin playing them against each other. Eddie Marsan, Martin Compston and Gemma Arterton star in this British crime thriller

programme.title: Body
programme.desc: After three twenty-something girls break into a mansion and inadvertently murder the groundskeeper, they slowly self-destruct as they decide what to do with the dead body in the living room

programme.title: Basic Instinct 2
programme.desc: Sharon Stone returns to the role that made her a star in this sexy sequel that finds best-selling crime novelist Catherine Tramell under suspicion for murder once again, this time for the death of a high-profile British athlete. When Scotland Yard criminal psychologist Dr. Michael Glass (David Morrissey) is assigned to profile Tramell, however, he finds himself drawn irresistibly into her web of seduction and lies. David Thewlis also stars in this sizzling thriller from director Michael Caton-Jones ("This Boy's Life," "Rob Roy")

programme.desc: In small-town Texas, an affable mortician strikes up a friendship with a wealthy widow, though when she starts to become controlling, he goes to great lengths to separate himself from her grasp. Stars Shirley MacLaine, Jack Black and Matthew McConaughey. Richard Linklater directs

programme.title: Calendar Girls
programme.desc: Comedy based on the true story of a women's group in a small English town who choose to upend the traditional order by posing nude for their annual charity calendar. Stars Helen Mirren and Julie Walters

programme.title: Lovesick
programme.desc: Matt LeBlanc stars in this comic tale as a man who has everything going for him, except love - which sends him clinically insane the moment he falls for someone. With the help of his friends and his wacky neighbor, he must find a way to overcome his psychosis to claim his chance at true love. Also stars Chevy Chase

programme.title: The Hand That Rocks The Cradle
programme.desc: A live-in nanny (Rebecca De Mornay) with a frightening hidden agenda becomes trouble for her employers (Annabella Sciorra and Matt McCoy) when a seething vendetta explodes into homicidal rage in this well-crafted thriller, a box office smash

programme.title: Tart
programme.desc: A spoiled New York City high school student (Dominique Swain) experiments with sex, drugs and murder at a luxurious country estate, along with her rich friends and the boy (Brad Renfro) of her fantasies in this stark coming-of-age drama costarring Bijou Phillips and Mischa Barton

programme.title: The Dramatics (A Comedy)
programme.desc: When an out-of-work actress unexpectedly lands a starring role in the sexually explicit mini-series adaptation of a best-selling erotic novel, her aimless, stoner boyfriend does his best to be supportive. But when her volatile, Oscar� winning co-lead takes "rehearsals" too far, her dream job becomes her boyfriend's worst nightmare and the couple is forced to decide whether or not their relationship is worth fighting for. Stars Pablo Schreiber

programme.title: Veronika Decides to Die
programme.desc: Sarah Michelle Gellar stars as a young woman who attempts suicide and wakes up inside a mysterious mental asylum, run by an unorthodox psychiatrist, where she learns that she has only weeks to live

programme.title: Ask Me Anything
programme.desc: A beautiful and lost young woman takes a year off before college to find herself, and chronicles her life in an anonymous blog, but as she becomes embroiled further in a series of sexual and romantic misadventures, her fearless narrative begins to crack

programme.title: Things You Can Tell Just By Looking At Her
programme.desc: Glenn Close, Holly Hunter, Cameron Diaz, Calista Flockhart, Kathy Baker and Amy Brenneman star in Rodrigo Garcia's debut feature, composed of five narratives which examine the hidden emotional lives of women in contemporary Los Angeles. An unmarried bank manager faces the possibility of an abortion; a police detective discovers her blind sister's astute insight; a lonely gynecologist consults a psychic; a lesbian couple confronts the finality of their relationship; and a single mother becomes erotically intrigued by a dwarf next door(n)

programme.title: Woman in Gold
programme.desc: Sixty years after fleeing Vienna, an elderly Jewish woman (Helen Mirren) attempts to reclaim family possessions that were seized by the Nazis. Among them is a famous portrait of her beloved aunt, painted by Gustav Klimt. With the help of a young lawyer she embarks upon a lengthy legal battle to recover what rightfully belongs to her family(n)

programme.title: The Best Man
programme.desc: A group of successful college friends reunite for a wedding, but when one of the bridesmaids gets her hands on the best man's steamy new novel about to hit bookstores, a series of scandals about the friends are revealed that wreak havoc on their relationships. Stars Taye Diggs and Nia Long(n)

programme.title: Margaret Cho: psyCHO
programme.desc: Three-time Grammy� and Emmy� nominated comedian Margaret Cho performs in front of a live audience in this provocative and hilarious comedy special event, tackling off-limits issues from Boko Haram to female empowerment with her razor sharp insight and wit(n)

programme.title: SXSW Comedy Night Two with W. Kamau Bell
programme.desc: Stand-up W. Kamua Bell hosts the hottest comics at the SXSW festival in the second of this two-part showcase featuring today's heavyweights and tomorrow's stars, including Todd Glass, Wyatt Cenac, Iliza Shlesinger, Rachel Feinstein, Nate Bargatze, Matt Braunger, Mark Normand, Beth Stelling, Joe DeRosa and Jon Huck(n)

programme.title: Meet the Hitlers
programme.desc: A documentary that examines the relationship between names and identity, by exploring the lives of people who are linked by the name Hitler. This character-driven story offers an intimate portrait of its subjects whose reactions to their name span the spectrum of human experience, from tragedy to comedy, and heartbreak to hope(n)

programme.title: Cas & Dylan
programme.desc: When a terminally ill doctor reluctantly agrees to give a young woman who is an aspiring writer and social misfit a ride home, the pair end up on a cross country journey that opens their eyes to life's most important lessons. Directed by Jason Priestley(n)

programme.title: Ted Danson / Wanda Sykes
programme.desc: Host David Steinberg interviews big stars and living legends as they share never-before-heard anecdotes, intimate memories, and career-defining moments from the past five decades of comedy. This week's guests: Ted Danson and Wanda Sykes(n)

programme.title: G.B.F.
programme.desc: A closeted gay teen wants to join the popular girls' clique, but his scheme backfires when his best friend is forced out of the closet instead. Stars Megan Mullally and Natasha Lyonne(n)

programme.title: Jersey Girl
programme.desc: Liv Tyler and Ben Affleck star in this romantic comedy about a music promoter whose career is sidelined by an unexpected tragedy and a personal blowup, leaving him to take care of his precocious daughter. Also stars Jennifer Lopez, Will Smith and Jason Biggs(n)

programme.title: The Hundred-Foot Journey
programme.desc: When a displaced Indian family opens a restaurant in the south of France, just 100 feet from a Michelin star restaurant, a culinary war ensues between the two establishments. Stars Academy Award� winner Helen Mirren(n)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Daddy's Little Girls
programme.desc: A hard working, blue collar mechanic sues for custody of his three daughters, and falls in love with his beautiful lawyer in this domestic drama from writer and director Tyler Perry, starring Idris Elba, Gabrielle Union and Louis Gossett Jr(n)

programme.title: Dirty Weekend
programme.desc: Mathew Broderick stars as an uptight man who is stranded in a city where a year earlier, had too many drinks and had an unexpected encounter that haunts him. With his female coworker at his side, he sets out to figure out what happened that night. Directed by Neil Labute(n)

programme.title: The Smurfs 2
programme.desc: Gargamel is back, and this time he's sending the Smurfs on a wild adventure through Paris in this globe-trotting sequel to the 2011 hit. Determined to harness the magical essence of the Smurfs, wicked wizard Gargamel (voice of Hank Azaria) creates a diminutive race of mischief makers known as the Naughties. But in order to get the results he's looking for, Gargamel will need to get his hands on a genuine Smurf. Enter Smurfette (voice of Katy Perry), the only one of her kind who knows the spell that can transform Naughties into actual Smurfs. Having recently shot to fame in Paris due to his impressive magical powers, Gargamel kidnaps Smurfette, and sweeps her away to the City of Light. With Papa Smurf (voice of Jonathan Winters) and company hot on his trail, however, the scheming wizard quickly realizes that executing his diabolical plan will be easier said than done. Meanwhile, Smurfette's growing sense of insecurity leaves her vulnerable to the scheming of Naughties Vexy (voice of Christina Ricci) and Hackus (voice of J.B. Smoove). Neil Patrick Harris and Jayma Mays also lend their voices

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Bart Gets an Elephant. Bill and Marty (voices of Dan Castellaneta and Harry Shearer), wacky morning drive-time DJ's on Springfield's radio station KBBL, are staging a new contest in which the winner gets to choose between two prizes -- a full grown African elephant or 10,000 dollars. Bart Simpson (voice of Nancy Cartwright) ends up winning the contest, and decides he wants the elephant. Bill and Marty were never expecting anyone to actually choose the elephant, and tell Bart they don't have one to give him. Bart refuses to change his mind, and after the local media picks up on the story, KBBL relents and gives Bart an elephant, which he calls Stampy. Bart loves his new pet, but Stampy is less than excited about his new environment, while Homer (voice of Dan Castellaneta) and Marge (voice of Julie Kavner) aren't sure how they'll pay for the elephant's feeding and upkeep, and Lisa (voice of Yeardley Smith) believes Stampy should be in a jungle, where he belongs. Eventually, Homer and Marge put their feet down and tell Bart that Stampy can't stay with them; an animal sanctuary is willing to take Stampy, but they can't pay anything for him, while a less than scrupulous ivory dealer is willing to give the Simpsons a big check for the elephant, but he would almost certainly kill the animal. "Bart Gets an Elephant" first aired on March 31, 1994

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Lady Bouvier's Lover. Marge and Homer Simpson (voices of Julie Kavner and Dan Castellaneta) are celebrating the birthday of their baby daughter Maggie, and since it wouldn't be a birthday party without grandparents in attendance, Homer's father, Grampa (also voiced by Castellaneta), and Marge's mother, Jacqueline Bouvier (also voiced by Kavner), are invited to join the fun. Marge thinks both Grampa and Jacqueline seem a bit lonely, and she encourages the two to spend time together. They do, and before long Grampa has fallen in love with Jacqueline. Grampa is considering popping the big question to Jacqueline during a dance at the Senior Citizen's Center when he discovers that he has a rival for her affections -- aging multi-millionaire C. Montgomery Burns (voice of Harry Shearer). Grampa can't match Burns' bankroll (or his dancing ability), but when he learns that Burns has planned to wed Jacqueline, he's determined to stop the ceremony however he can. Meanwhile, rabid Itchy and Scratchy fan Bart (voice of Nancy Cartwright) can't resist temptation when rare animation cells from the show are offered for sale on television. However, after putting 400 dollars on Homer's credit card without his permission, Bart gets his cell and discovers it's just a frame of Itchy's arm, and practically worthless. "Lady Bouvier's Lover" first aired on May 12, 1994(n)

Lawrence stars as Jamal Walker, an employee at a medieval-themed mini-golf course who wakes up in 14th century England after a blow to the head. Jamal has soon allied himself with a peasant girl and a broken-down ex-knight to defeat the evil King Leo (Kevin Conway) and his bullying minion, Sir Knolte (Tom Wilkinson). In the meantime, Jamal busts some modern dance moves on the medieval dance floor and encounters such intriguing residents of the period as knaves, peasants, archers, jousting knights, maidens, a princess, and even a giant. Black Knight (2001) is the sophomore directing vehicle of longtime television producer Gil Junger, who joins Lawrence in replacing the team originally attached to this comic vehicle, director F. But when her egotistical boss takes credit for her work, she leaves the salon with the shampoo girl in tow to open a shop of her own. Gina buys a rundown salon and inherits a motley group of headstrong stylists, a colorful clientele, and a sexy piano-playing electrician. It's a rocky road to fulfilling her dreams, but you can't keep a good woman down(n)

The documentary follows Kevin Boyle and his players on their trek towards a climactic, winner-take-all showdown against archrival St. Anthony's of Jersey City. Included: comments from players and coaches(n)

programme.title: Fantastic Four
programme.desc: Brilliant scientist Reed Richards builds a device that allows users to teleport to an alternate dimension, but an experiment involving it goes wrong and leaves him and his three teammates with unusual superpowers. The quartet are then forced to work together to battle an enemy from their past. This reboot of the iconic Marvel superhero team stars Miles Teller as Richards (who becomes Mr. Fantastic, able to bend and stretch his body into impossible shapes), Michael B. Jordan as Johnny Storm (aka the Human Torch, whose body can erupt in flames), Kate Mara as Sue Storm (aka the Invisible Woman -- no explanation needed), and Jamie Bell as Ben Grimm (who is transformed into the rock monster known as The Thing). Directed by Josh Trank, who previously worked with Jordan on the superhero film Chronicle(n)

programme.title: The Second Best Exotic Marigold Hotel
programme.desc: An entrepreneur decides to expand his booming hotel business when a single vacancy leaves little room for a variety of eccentric seniors looking for a place within The Best Exotic Marigold Hotel for the Elderly and Beautiful(n)

programme.title: The Good Shepherd
programme.desc: One man bears witness to the secret history of America during the Cold War in this drama directed by celebrated actor Robert De Niro. In 1939, Edward Wilson (Matt Damon) is a young man with a bright future ahead of him -- he's a top student at Yale and the protégé of one of the school's leading English professors, Dr. Fredericks (Michael Gambon). But Wilson's life changes dramatically when he's invited to join Yale's powerful secret society, Skull and Bones. Through his Skull and Bones connections, Wilson meets Sam Murach (Alec Baldwin), an mysterious FBI agent who asks Wilson to investigate charges that Fredericks is a Nazi sympathizer working with the German government. Later, at a Skull and Bones party, Wilson is introduced to Clover Russell (Angelina Jolie), the sister of one of his classmates and the daughter of a powerful politician; their one-night stand leaves Clover pregnant, and Wilson must leave the woman he loves, Laura (Tammy Blanchard), to wed Clover and give their child a name. Shortly after their wedding, thanks to his work with Murach, Wilson is invited to join the Office of Strategic Services, a military intelligence organization organized by Bill Sullivan (Robert De Niro), and Wilson accepts. Through World War II, Wilson serves with the OSS, and learns he can trust no one in the game of international espionage, which helps make him little more than a stranger to his wife, his son, and his few friends. As the OSS evolves into the Central Intelligence Agency after the war, Wilson becomes party to America's darkest and most dangerous secrets, and in the wake of the futile Bay of Pigs invasion in 1961, Wilson is forced to make a terrible choice between the security of his nation and the safety of his family. Inspired by the true-life story of CIA founder James J. Angleton, The Good Shepherd boasts an impressive supporting cast, including William Hurt, John Turturro, Billy Crudup, Joe Pesci, and Timothy Hutton(n)

programme.desc: Sparks fly and complications arise when a group of college friends reunites for a weekend wedding in Los Angeles. A hot young cast including Adam Garcia, Amy Adams, James Van Der Beek and Mena Suvari stars in this comedy-drama. Colin Hanks, Xander Berkeley. Directed by Matthew Cole Weis(n)

programme.title: The Hammer
programme.desc: This inspiring, feel-good biopic stars Russell Harvard as Matt Hamill, a deaf man who becomes a champion collegiate wrestler(n)

programme.title: What's Up, Doc?
programme.desc: Barbra Streisand and Ryan O'Neal play a mismatched couple in director Peter Bogdanovich's salute to the 1930s screwball comedies(n)

programme.title: The Man with One Red Shoe
programme.desc: In this remake of the French comedy The Tall Blond Man with One Black Shoe, a concert violinist (Tom Hanks) given to strange dress is mistaken for a CIA man by actual agents (because of his habit of wearing one red shoe). He is then hurled into a world of terrorist activity(n)

programme.title: Baby Boom
programme.desc: A successful Manhattan yuppie becomes the custodian for a one-year old. Though she plans to give the child up for adoption, she grows to love motherhood, leading to an unexpected career change(n)

programme.title: Keeping the Faith
programme.desc: Best friends, a priest (Norton) and a rabbi (Stiller) both fall in love with the same girl (Elfman). However, neither of the men can pursue the relationship due to their religious beliefs: the priest cannot break his vow of celibacy and the rabbi cannot marry her since she is not Jewish(n)

programme.title: I Think I Love My Wife
programme.desc: Actor/comedian Chris Rock directs and stars in this American remake of Eric Rohmer' s classic French comedy Chloe in the Afternoon. Richard Cooper (Rock) is a high-powered investment banker with a beautiful wife and two wonderful children. Though on the surface it would appear that Richard could want nothing more out of life, his thoughts always seem to drift toward sex. Whether it's during his daily commute into the city, his endless barrage of meetings, or even his downtime changing diapers at home, Richard's mind is constantly preoccupied by fantasies about the women he sees on the commuter train, on the city streets, and in the boardroom. Richard's daily life has gradually devolved into a blur of mind-numbing banality, and these days sexual fantasy has become his sole means of escaping the constant pressures of work and fatherhood. Though Richard never had any real intention of cheating on his faithful but preoccupied wife Brenda (Gina Torres), a chance run-in with his old friend Nikki (Kerry Washington) -- a drop-dead gorgeous stunner who appears at his office door one day seeking career advice from the successful banker -- finds his steely resolve fast turning flimsy. It's not long before the smitten Richard and the smoldering Nikki are meeting for clandestine lunches, and temptation begins to turn Richard's once-predictable life upside down. As his uncontrollable fantasies begin to lead him down the dangerous path of infidelity, the man who once kept his libido safely in check finds it increasingly difficult to refrain from acting on his impulses(n)

programme.title: Zero Effect
programme.desc: This cleverly constructed detective thriller stars Bill Pullman as Daryl Zero, a man whose eccentric and reclusive nature does not stop him functioning as one of the best detectives in the business. Hired to discover who is behind a blackmailing operation, Zero's investigation becomes too thorough for his client's liking, revealing a trail of lies and deception that leads to.well, that would be telling. The intricate plot is packed with surprises and the richly realised characters will keep you engrossed(n)

programme.title: Making of 'Entourage'
programme.desc: A look at "Entourage," a 2015 comedy based on the HBO series about a young movie star in Hollywood and his close circle of friends and associates. The film stars Adrian Grenier, Kevin Connolly, Kevin Dillon, Jerry Ferrara and Jeremy Piven, and is written and directed by Doug Ellin(n)

programme.title: Connie and Carla
programme.desc: Two women are forced to go on the run after witnessing a brutal crime. Seeking refuge as entertainers they find the kind of success they always dreamed of(n)

programme.title: National Treasure
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage hunts for a legendary treasure that's been hidden for centuries. Unfortunately, villain Sean Bean is after the loot too(n)

programme.desc: Best friends, a priest (Norton) and a rabbi (Stiller) both fall in love with the same girl (Elfman). programme.desc: Tour guide Georgia is single, miserable and sick of leading uninterested holidaymakers around ancient Greek ruins. She's set to head home to the US, but could love finally be on the horizon?(n)

programme.desc: Benjamin Franklin Gates (Nicolas Cage) descends from a family of treasure-seekers who have shared an unusual quest. As Gates-family legend has it, George Washington, Thomas Jefferson, and Benjamin Franklin hid a massive cache of gold during the waning days of the Revolutionary War. Ben's close to discovering its whereabouts, but the FBI and his competition are also hip to the hunt

programme.desc: From one of the best sports books ever written comes a compelling, fact-based chronicle of a high-school football team in West Texas. There, winning isn't everything, it's the only thing. Billy Bob Thornton stars as the coach, and country-music star Tim McGraw plays the abusive father of a player. The film was directed and co-written by Peter Berg, who adapted his cousin H.G. Bissinger's bestseller

While attempting to fly a plane back to New York, the animals crash land in mainland Africa, where they are amazed to be reunited with more of their own kind and, in some cases, their actual families. Unfortunately, life in Africa is not what it at first seems, with Alex soon falling foul of lion etiquette and the humans causing problems for all of the wild animals of the Savannah

programme.title: The Secret Garden
programme.desc: Kate Maberly stars in this adaptation of the classic children's novel about a girl who discovers an abandoned garden on her uncle's large Victorian country estate. With the help of a local boy, the girl sets out to restore the garden and, once it is blooming again, she discovers it has special powers. After it has flowered, she brings her invalid cousin to the garden, and he is magically healed. Directed by Agnieszka Holland

programme.desc: Eddie Murphy is hilarious in this spirited Disney farce based on the theme-park ride. Filled with magical special effects, the story centers on a real-estate agent whose family gets stuck in a creepy old house crawling with ghosts

programme.title: Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa
programme.desc: Animated adventure sequel to Madagascar continuing the adventures of the animals from a New York zoo who have become trapped on the African island. programme.title: Pan

programme.title: Racing Stripes
programme.desc: Family comedy in which an abandoned zebra grows up believing he is a racehorse and, with the help of his farmyard friends and a teenage girl, pursues his dream of racing with thoroughbreds

programme.title: Before the Rains
programme.desc: An Englishman intent on opening a spice plantation in Kerala attempts to gain the trust of the local villagers and destroys numerous lives in the process in this period drama from director/cinematographer Santosh Sivan. The year is 1937, and the power that the English wield over the citizens of India can be devastating even in the mildest of cases. Henry Moores (Linus Roache) is an entrepreneur and businessman who has singled out Kerala as the site where he plans to break ground on a potentially lucrative spice plantation. When Henry discovers that he will have to build a new road in order to make his plans feasible, he enlists the aid of trusted right-hand man T.K. (Rahul Bose) is warming the locals to the idea. The project is going to take plenty of manpower, and Henry is going to need all the help he can get. But while Henry relies on T.K. to help him realize his professional goals, his personal needs fall on the shoulders of his pretty housekeeper, Sajani (Nandita Das). One day, when their trip into the forest to collect honey takes a decidedly sensual turn, two local village boys witness the erotically charged tryst and word eventually gets back to Sanani's husband in the village(n)

programme.title: Fantastic Four
programme.desc: Brilliant scientist Reed Richards builds a device that allows users to teleport to an alternate dimension, but an experiment involving it goes wrong and leaves him and his three teammates with unusual superpowers. The quartet are then forced to work together to battle an enemy from their past. This reboot of the iconic Marvel superhero team stars Miles Teller as Richards (who becomes Mr. Fantastic, able to bend and stretch his body into impossible shapes), Michael B. Jordan as Johnny Storm (aka the Human Torch, whose body can erupt in flames), Kate Mara as Sue Storm (aka the Invisible Woman -- no explanation needed), and Jamie Bell as Ben Grimm (who is transformed into the rock monster known as The Thing). Directed by Josh Trank, who previously worked with Jordan on the superhero film Chronicle(n)

programme.title: The Sissy Duckling
programme.desc: Written by Torch Song Trilogy author Harvey Fierstein (who also provides the voice of the title character), the made-for-cable animated special The Sissy Duckling is a study of what it means to be "a bird of a different feather." Sensitive duckling Elmer is a source of embarrassment for his macho father and an object of ridicule for other ducks his own age. Unable and unwilling to defend himself against bullies, and clearly not a "leader of ducks" like his take-charge dad, Elmer dreams of leaving his pond and going somewhere where he will be appreciated for his intellect and resourcefulness. He finally gets this opportunity, only to make a dramatic return just in time to rescue his father -- and the rest of the flock -- when hunters invade the forest. The Sissy Duckling was first telecast September 14, 1999, on HBO(n)

programme.title: Disney's The Kid
programme.desc: Bruce Willis stars in this fable about a successful but unhappy image consultant, who changes his life after being magically visited by himself as an 8-year-old boy. Rusty: Spencer Breslin. Amy: Emily Mortimer.Janet: Lily Tomlin. Directed by Jon Turteltaub(n)

Owen Wilson, Steve Coogan, Ricky Gervais, and Rebel Wilson co-star(n)

programme.title: Turbo: A Power Rangers Movie
programme.desc: The second feature-length outing for the high-kicking, power-punching defenders of mankind sees the teenagers do battle against the evil Divatox, a screeching villainess hellbent on ruling the galaxy. Her masterplan is to capture Lerigot, a kindly wizard with fantastical powers whom she intends to use to release Maligore, a hideous molten monster. Only the heroic Power Rangers stand in her way(n)

programme.title: Thunderbirds
programme.desc: Action adventure tale based on the popular 1960s TV series created by Gerry and Sylvia Anderson. Following another successful mission, International Rescue faces a crisis when its space station, Thunderbird 5, is damaged by a suspected meteor strike. However, criminal mastermind Aristotle Spode, aka the Hood, is waiting for the team to vacate their secret island base so that he can take control and learn more about their operation(n)

programme.title: The Electric Company
programme.desc: Wicked Itch. Manny Spamboni wants the movie that Lisa and the gang are making to be all about him(n)

programme.title: Crashbox
programme.desc: No additional information is available(n)

programme.title: Jem and the Holograms
programme.desc: A small-town teen's singing video goes viral and catapults her and her sister's band into global super stardom, but their newfound fame threatens to break apart their familial bonds(n)

programme.title: Night at the Museum: Secret of the Tomb
programme.desc: Ben Stiller and director Shawn Levy return for more after-hours mayhem in this third outing of the successful Night at the Museum series. When the magic that brings the exhibits to life begins to fade, Larry (Ben Stiller) rallies his historical friends for a trip to London and the adventure of a lifetime. Owen Wilson, Steve Coogan, Ricky Gervais, and Rebel Wilson co-star(n)

programme.title: Rugrats in Paris: The Movie
programme.desc: The adorable Pied Pipers of diapers return in this cartoon charmer, which finds the toddlers frolicking in Paris. But the gang gets into a pickle when a wicked theme-park executive schemes to marry Chuckie's widowed dad for her own selfish gain(n)

programme.title: Shrek
programme.desc: Mike Myers, Eddie Murphy and Cameron Diaz lend their voices to this outrageously funny comedy with dazzling computer animation. It's a fractured fairy tale about an ogre who falls in love with a princess. It's also a clever and sophisticated spoof of children's stories and all things Disney. John Lithgow(n)

programme.title: Alvin and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Alvin, Simon, and Theodore are back in director Tim Hill's computer-animation/live-action hybrid following the further adventures of the world's most adorable singing trio. Songwriter Dave Seville (Jason Lee) has been struggling to gain recognition in the music industry for some time, and despite the fact that his former college roommate (David Cross) is now a high-profile powerbroker at Jett Records, Dave still can't manage to get a break. Things soon start to look up, however, when Dave discovers three singing chipmunks hiding out in the branches of a Christmas tree in Jett Records' world headquarters. Realizing that these woodland crooners cold prove to be his ticket to the big time, Dave does his best to transform Alvin (Justin Long), Simon (Matthew Gray Gubler), and Theodore (Jesse McCartney) into the next great pop sensation. As adorable and talented as they may be, though, these bouncy little critters aren't quite domesticated just yet; they still have a wild streak in them a mile wide, and it isn't long before Dave's life, home, and career are in utter chaos. But staying mad at such lovable little creatures is next to impossible, no matter what kind of mischief they might get into(n)

programme.title: Everest
programme.desc: In this adventure docudrama set in 1996, several groups of professional climbers successfully scale Mount Everest only to be faced with tragedy when a monster storm surprises them as they attempt to make their descent. Jake Gyllenhaal, Josh Brolin, Jason Clarke, and John Hawkes co-star. Directed by Baltasar Kormakur (2 Guns)

programme.title: No Man's Land: The Rise of Reeker
programme.desc: The background of the creature whose horrible smell is a harbinger of death comes into focus in this sequel set in the same "supernatural world" of its 2005 predecessor and starring Michael Muhney, Desmond Askew, and Valerie Cruz

programme.title: The Transporter
programme.desc: For the right price, ex-Special Forces officer Frank Martin will take anything anywhere. He just has three rules: no changes to the plan; no real names; no opening the package... until one package starts to move. Inside it is the beautiful Lai and, although Martin delivers her to the unscrupulous Darren "Wall Street" Bettencourt, his conscience soon gets the better of him and he decides to track down Wall Street and his masters and rescue Lai…

programme.title: Making of 'Jurassic World'
programme.desc: A look at "Jurassic World" (2015), the fourth installment in the "Jurassic Park" series that unfolds 22 years after the 1993 original and features a new dinosaur theme park on Isla Nubar. The film stars Chris Pratt, Bryce Dallas Howard and Vincent D'Onofrio, and is directed by Colin Trevorrow

programme.title: Black Sea
programme.desc: A rogue captain seeks out treasure in the Black Sea, despite a suspicion that he may be deceived

programme.title: Far From the Madding Crowd
programme.desc: The story of headstrong Bathsheba Everdene who attracts three different suitors; Sergeant Frank Troy, bachelor William Boldwood, and sheep farmer Gabriel Oak

programme.title: Reindeer Games
programme.desc: Thriller about an ex-con who, upon release, adopts his dead ex-cellmate's identity just to meet the man's girlfriend. But the girl's brother had plans to use the dead con's expert knowledge in a casino robbery, and the imposter is forced to take part

programme.title: The Namesake
programme.desc: Mira Nair's family drama stars Kal Penn as Gogol, a young Indian American whose name, chosen by his parents Ashoke and Ashima after the Russian writer, causes him to question his identity. Is he first generation American or from a long line of Bengali ancestors? As he and his parents try to make sense of his problems and, indeed, their places in the contemporary world, this is a moving, thought-provoking examination of the immigrant experience

programme.title: Ted 2
programme.desc: Ted (voice of Seth MacFarlane) ties the knot with Tami-Lynn (Jessica Barth), and recruits his best friend John (Mark Wahlberg) as a sperm donor in order to start a family in this sequel to the comedy hit about a teddy bear come to life. Later, when the Commonwealth of Massachusetts demands that Ted appear before a judge to prove he's a real person, the frisky bear and his pal vow to fight for their civil rights. Morgan Freeman and Amanda Seyfried co-star

programme.title: Face Off
programme.desc: FBI agent John Travolta faces off against terrorist Nicolas Cage in this suspenseful drama, in which the two principals trade identities after their faces are swapped surgically. Director John Woo's masterful action sequences and the spectacular stunts will have you on the edge of your seat. Joan Allen, Gina Gershon

programme.title: The Theory of Everything
programme.desc: This touching biopic of celebrated physicist Stephen Hawking explores his early years at Cambridge, where he fell in love with liberal-arts student and future wife Jane shortly before being diagnosed with ALS. As the years progress, Jane begins to feel more like a nurse than a spouse, and Hawking develops feelings for a woman who is hired to care for him

programme.title: Black Sea
programme.desc: A rogue captain seeks out treasure in the Black Sea, despite a suspicion that he may be deceived

programme.title: The Uninvited
programme.desc: After the death of her ill mother in a fire, the young teenager Anna tries to commit suicide and is sent to a mental institution for treatment. Ten months later, Anna still cannot remember what had happened on the night her mother died

programme.desc: A scheming politician programs bikini-clad robots to seduce his opponents so he can blackmail them(n)

programme.desc: A Hollywood family with some explosive secrets finds their perfect world unraveling in this melodramatic satire(n)

programme.title: Jackie Brown
programme.desc: Quentin Tarantino's complex crime story is spun around a hard-bitten flight attendant trying to outsmart a smarmy gunrunner(n)

programme.title: Wild Wild West
programme.desc: The two best hired guns in the West must save President Grant from the clutches of a 19th century inventor-villain(n)

programme.title: Making of 'Everest'
programme.desc: A look at "Everest," a 2016 drama based on the attempts by two groups to climb Mount Everest in 1996. The film stars Jason Clarke, Jake Gyllenhaal, Josh Brolin and Robin Wright, and is directed by Baltasar Kormákur(n)

programme.title: Ocean's Thirteen
programme.desc: The remaining members of Danny Ocean's gang regroup to jeopardise the nefarious plans of a businessman who double-crossed one of Danny's old friends. The team plan to ruin the opening of his glitzy Las Vegas casino and hotel by rigging the games and ensuring that every punter goes home with a jackpot(n)

programme.title: Jupiter Ascending

programme.title: Magic Mike
programme.desc: Veteran male stripper Magic Mike teaches a protégé about seducing women, making big bucks and hard partying in this comedy-drama inspired by Channing Tatum's life before he became an actor(n)

programme.title: Van Helsing
programme.desc: In this action-packed, special effect-filled super production, horrifying legendary creatures challenge the brave monster hunter Van Helsing (Hugh Jackman, X-Men). It all starts when Count Dracula (Richard Roxburgh) decides to use Dr. Victor Frankenstein's invention to create a legion of vampires. In order to do so, he needs to absorb the energy only the Werewolf can generate. To stop the experiment, the Vatican sends Van Helsing to Transylvania. There, together with Anna Valerious (Kate Beckinsale, Pearl Harbor) - whose family has been fighting the forces of evil for decades - he will face the terrifying monsters. The film was directed by the talented Stephen Sommers (The Mummy, The Mummy Returns)(n)

programme.title: The 33
programme.desc: Antonio Banderas, Rodrigo Santoro, and Martin Sheen star in this ensemble drama detailing the daring real-life rescue of 33 Chilean miners who were trapped in the San Jose Mine for 69 days in 2010. Patricia Riggen directs from a script by Jose Rivera and Mikko Alanne(n)

programme.title: The Maze Runner
programme.desc: A group of amnesiac teens awaken in a deadly maze, and search desperately for an escape route while gathering clues that could reveal the reason for their imprisonment. Meanwhile, dreams of a shadowy organization hint at a sinister agenda(n)

programme.title: Jupiter Ascending
programme.desc: In this sci-fi epic in which human beings are the least-evolved species in the known universe, an ex-soldier protects a seemingly ordinary woman who's been targeted for assassination by a ruthless queen(n)

programme.desc: An ex-con who has just been released from prison learns that his 10-year-old son belongs to a street gang. The boy's father looks to change the trajectory of his child's life(n)

programme.title: Unfriended
programme.desc: One year after a humiliating viral video drove a teen to commit suicide, her high-school classmates are terrorised by an anonymous online presence seeking revenge

programme.title: Inherent Vice
programme.desc: In this hilarious, offbeat detective story set in 1970 California, a drug-addled PI probes a conspiracy involving his ex-flame and her married, real-estate-developer boyfriend. Along the way, various eccentric characters complicate the investigation

programme.title: Open Your Eyes
programme.desc: An elderly couple in Nepal blinded by cataracts are given the opportunity to see again thanks to a simple surgery, but first they must be convinced to take the long journey to a clinic

programme.title: The Invasion
programme.desc: A crashed space shuttle spreads alien disease across America. Psychiatrist Carol finds out how to avoid the infection, but is she too late to save her son?

programme.title: MI-5
programme.desc: When head of counter-terrorism, Harry Pearce, goes missing, his apprentice Will Holloway sets off to find out what happened. With an impending attack on London looming and Holloway discovering a conspiracy running from Vietnam to the Mediterranean, he is on a race with time and must solve the case before it's too late

programme.title: Independence Day
programme.desc: A series of massive spaceships approach Earth, which many greet with open arms, looking forward to the first contact with alien life. Unfortunately, these extraterrestrials have not come in peace, and they unleash powerful weapons that destroy most of the world's major cities. Thrown into chaos, the survivors struggle to band together and put up a last-ditch resistance in order to save the human race

programme.desc: Twenty-two years after Jurassic Park opened on Isla Nubar, a dinosaur-themed resort attracts thousands of visitors each year, just as John Hammond envisioned. However, following a bad sag in turnout a new effort is undertaken to revitalize Jurassic World, but once again mankind's attempts to interfere with nature bring ominous results

programme.desc: A blind ex-army man, Lt. Colonel Frank Slade meets up with a young student and they both head off to New York for a weekend that will change their lives..

programme.title: Jurassic World
programme.desc: Twenty-two years after Jurassic Park opened on Isla Nubar, a dinosaur-themed resort attracts thousands of visitors each year, just as John Hammond envisioned. However, following a bad sag in turnout a new effort is undertaken to revitalize Jurassic World, but once again mankind's attempts to interfere with nature bring ominous results

programme.title: Vacation
programme.desc: In this installment of the "Vacation" series, the youngest son of the Griswold clan, now grown with a family of his own, sets out to re-create a cross-country road trip from his youth to an amusement park(n)

programme.title: Shrink
programme.desc: Jaded psychiatrist Henry Carter (Kevin Spacey) takes on a pro bono case that tests his professional fortitude in this blistering exposé of the "other" Hollywood. Between sorting through the various mental maladies of his famous patients, Henry barely has any time to deal with his own problems. Into the middle of the hapless shrink's malaise wanders a troubled teen who's his polar opposite. While Henry is tired of Tinseltown, his newest patient is obsessed with it(n)

programme.title: True Story
programme.desc: In this psychological thriller based on actual events, a disgraced journalist plays a game of cat and mouse with an accused murderer who assumed his identity while on the run(n)

programme.title: Meet the Donors: Does Money Talk?
programme.desc: Alexandra Pelosi looks at money in politics and interviews wealthy donors to Republican and Democratic parties to ask them about their contributions and philosophies. Also: a look at efforts to enact campaign-finance reform(n)

programme.title: Enemy at the Gates
programme.desc: A turning point in 20th century war history is the focus of this fact-based account of the 1942-1943 battle of Stalingrad, in which the Germans were finally defeated by Russian influence -- one of the bloodiest battles in World War II history. The film stars Jude Law as Vassili, a marksman from the Urals who is transported to Stalingrad in 1942, and a master German sniper, Major Koenig (Ed Harris). Koenig, an expert German sniper, is determined to eliminate his formidable opponent by any means necessary; meanwhile, Vassili has joined forces with Danilov (Joseph Fiennes), a young Russian political adversary, who is impressed by Vassili's skills and raises his profile in the Soviet Union. Both Vassili and Danilov become involved with Tanya (Rachel Weisz), whose Jewish parents have been captured by the Germans and have forced her to take up with the men on a sniper expedition. Koenig and Vassili begin to develop traps for each other, until fate inevitably must bring the two sharpshooters together. This large-scale production, financed mostly by Teuton companies, also features Bob Hoskins as Nikita Krushchev and Ron Perlman as an aging Russian sniper(n)

programme.title: Perkins' 14
programme.desc: Dark Ride director Craig Singer returns to the helm with this shocking horror film about a delusional psychopath who creates a unified team of 14 maniacal killers. Produced entirely over the Internet, where writers uploaded story details and actors submitted audition tapes, Perkins' 14 was released into theaters as part of the third After Dark Horror Fest. Ronald Perkins was just six years old when his parents were brutally slaughtered right before his eyes. Unable to overcome the incredible trauma of witnessing such a diabolical event, Perkins becomes convinced that the killers who murdered his parents will eventually return to finish the job they started years ago -- and he plans to be fully prepared to fight back when they do. Years later, when Perkins turns 34, he kidnaps 14 people from his hometown of Stone Cove and sets about reprogramming them to become relentless killing machines. Now, if the killers ever do return, they'll have to get through Perkins' 14 in order to reach their intended target. Trouble is, now that Perkins' 14 are ready for battle, they've become increasingly difficult to contain
In this erotic farce, a middle-aged composer with an enviable life is suddenly gripped by romantic obsession after a chance encounter with a ravishing bride. Nominated for 2 Oscars

programme.desc: Comedy about a bachelor who rushes into marrying a seemingly perfect woman, only to quickly discover he has made a terrible decision. programme.title: Scream 3
programme.desc: The final instalment in this hugely successful trilogy, takes place in Hollywood during production of "Stab 3, Return To Woodsboro". The production is a thriller which raises troubling questions about the events that terrified Woodsboro and continue to haunt Sidney Prescott. Three and a half years after leaving Windsor College, Sidney has settled in to a life of quiet seclusion in Northern Carolina. But that uneasy peace is shattered when terror erupts on the set of "Stab 3". Hotshot TV presenter Gale Weathers is called to the scene by the LAPD as the ultimate expert on the previous murders, and is reunited with Dewey. Will they survive to tell the tale this time?

programme.title: Hitman
programme.desc: An international assassin known only as Agent 47 (Timothy Olyphant) carries out high-profile hits for a mysterious organization known only as "The Agency" in this adaptation of the popular Eidos Interactive video-game series. Agent 47 is an elite, genetically engineered assassin who takes great pride in his work. His lethal grace, steady shot, and unparalleled precision have all served to make him one of the most sought-after assassins in the world. But when the killer without a conscience is faced with an unanticipated series of developments, his entire perception of reality begins to shift. On assignment to take out Russian head of state Belicoff (Ulrich Thomsen), Agent 47 is caught off guard by the appearance of presidential look-alikes. When the high-profile hit captures the attention of such powerful intelligence organizations as the CIA and Interpol, agent Mike Whittier (Dougray Scott) is dispatched to rein Agent 47 in. Meanwhile, a mysterious Russian prostitute named Nika (Olga Kurylenko) has walked into Agent 47's life, causing the methodical killer to become overwhelmed by emotions that were previously foreign to him(n)

programme.title: Scream
programme.desc: If you thought horror films were becoming tame and predictable, wait until you see this blockbusting nail-biter from the chief of the chiller movie, director Wes Craven! Neve Campbell stars as Sidney Prescott, a teenager trying to come to terms with her mother's murder several years earlier. But she is plunged back into a world of terror when the town of Woodsboro is once again visited by a psychopathic killer intent on targeting high school students just like Sidney and her friends. This particular killer has an extensive knowledge of horror movie trivia and delights in tormenting his victims before murdering them. As the bodies begin to pile up around Sidney, her friend Tatum (Rose McGowan) and her boyfriend (Skeet Ulrich), tabloid TV reporter Gale Weathers (Courteney Cox) - someone whom Sidney has her own reasons for despising - arrives in town to report on this latest spate of killings(n)
